name: Content Pipeline
description: Automated content creation and publishing workflow. Research topics, draft posts, schedule publishing across platforms.
author: community

posts_per_week.label: Posts Per Week
posts_per_week.description: Target number of posts per week

steps.name: Research Topics
steps.description: Scout trending topics and content ideas
steps.task: Research trending topics in {{config.topics}}. Find 10 content ideas for the week. Check what's performing well on {{config.platforms}}. Save ideas with angles and hooks.

steps.name: Draft Content
steps.task: Draft a post for {{config.platforms}} about {{config.topics}}. Tone: {{config.tone}}. Include a hook, value, and CTA. Save as draft for review.

steps.name: Review & Publish
steps.description: Review drafts and publish approved content
steps.task: Present drafted content for approval. On approval, publish to {{config.platforms}}. Track post URLs and engagement metrics.

steps.name: Track Engagement
steps.description: Monitor post performance and adjust strategy
steps.task: Check engagement metrics for all published content this week. Report: impressions, likes, comments, shares. Identify top-performing content and why. Suggest adjustments for next week.
